p: A second approach to produce a safer YF vaccine is to express the YFV pre-M and E proteins either as recombinant proteins or in another safer viral vector. The most advanced vaccine of this type utilizes the replication-defective Modified Vaccinia Ankara (MVA) vector [ 132]. This vaccine has been shown to induce protective immunity in small animal models and is currently being evaluated in a Phase I trial in humans [ 133].
